channel.title: Graph Databases on Blowfish

item.title: Exploring GraphDB and Neo4j - A Guide to Graph Databases
item.author: nuno@n9o.xyz (Blowfish)
item.description:
RDBMS vs. Neo4j (Cypher) Command Comparison

Are GraphDB faster than RDBMS?

Graph databases (GraphDBs) can be faster than relational databases (RDBMS) in scenarios that involve complex relationships and deep traversals, but they are not always universally faster. It depends on the query type, data structure, and use case.

item.title: Type of Databases
item.author: nuno@n9o.xyz (Blowfish)
item.description:
What are the various types of databases?

Introduction

In the 21st Century, Data is the real oil of machines. There are different kinds of oils and there are different kinds of containers. Similarly, there are different kinds of data and there are different kinds of database software to manage these databases. Broadly we call them SQL and NoSQL databases. But In the NoSQL, there are some other finer groups for specific purposes. Let’s look into these.
